author: mtosi
body:
as reported/suggested/requested by tracking POG
(@rovere @VinInn @makortel)
recent issues reported by tier0 related to memory consuption
might be related to some plots done by the tracking DQM
(or at least, given the current framework, such plots are highly stressing the system)

this PR should switch off many of them

@davidlange6 , do you like this ?
title: drop tracking DQM histos (which contribute to memory issues @tier0)
